verses.text: \w Come|strong="H3212"\w*! \w Let|strong="H3212"\w* us ring \w out|strong="H3212"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w joy|strong="H7442"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w let|strong="H3212"\w* us merrily \w shout|strong="H7321"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*.

\w Before|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* let \w us|strong="H6440"\w* \w come|strong="H6923"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w thanks|strong="H8426"\w*, \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w songs|strong="H2158"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w praise|strong="H8426"\w* let \w us|strong="H6440"\w* \w shout|strong="H7321"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* gods.

\w In|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w depths|strong="H4278"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* earth, \w the|strong="H3027"\w* heights \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w*, \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*: \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w dry|strong="H3006"\w* \w land|strong="H3006"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

Come! Let \w us|strong="H6213"\w* \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w bow|strong="H7812"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* knees \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* creator.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w our|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w*; \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* tends, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w care|strong="H3027"\w*. \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H5971"\w* \w heed|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*:

‘\w Do|strong="H4057"\w* not \w harden|strong="H7185"\w* \w your|strong="H7185"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* Meribah, \w or|strong="H3117"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* Massah, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*,

\w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* ancestors \w tempted|strong="H5254"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w tried|strong="H5254"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, \w though|strong="H1571"\w* \w they|strong="H1571"\w* had \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w deeds|strong="H6467"\w*.

‘\w For|strong="H3045"\w* forty \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w was|strong="H3824"\w* filled \w with|strong="H3045"\w* loathing \w for|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* said: “\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w wandering|strong="H8582"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w ignorant|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H7650"\w* \w I|strong="H7650"\w* \w solemnly|strong="H7650"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H7650"\w* \w them|strong="H7650"\w* \w in|strong="H7650"\w* \w my|strong="H7650"\w* anger, that never would they enter \w my|strong="H7650"\w* \w place|strong="H4496"\w* of \w rest|strong="H4496"\w*.’
